Name: Billiards Dungeon
About the game: Come adventurers! I, the Dark Lord, challenge you to journey through my realms. Explore through my labyrinth and fight through my armies. If you're lucky you'll have a honor of challenging me. If you fear not death itself, enter the Billiards Dungeon. Ulzaark You have been challenged by the Dark-Lord, Ulzaark. Journey through his realm in order to uncover relics lost in time. Play multiple characters as your renown grows throughout the realms. Start as a Knight, and unlock other characters with specific skills that will assist you in your journey. The Gameplay: You are a cue-ball character moving through billiards-based, procedurally-generated floors. Use your mouse to control the direction and force of your character as you battle through rooms. Defeat an army of fantasy creatures by smashing into them or sending them into bottomless pits. Features! Billiards Dungeon’s unique mechanics make for a never before played experience. Begin your journey as a Knight, and then unlock a Ranger, Rogue, and Wizard. Battle through a multitude of fantasy creatures each with distinctive features. As you progress further into Ulzaark’s lair, find new and more dangerous enemies. Unlock items as your renown grows across the land. Never play the same game twice with procedurally-generated rooms. Start off in the mines, make your way to the dungeon, and eventually into a final layer containing the dark lord himself. The three difficulty levels within the game allow you to play at your comfort level. You can begin your playthrough with easy and eventually challenge yourself with the unlockable hard mode. Billiards Dungeon is a unique, endlessly replayable experience. The large variety of items, procedurally-generated rooms, and different difficulty levels guarantee to give you hours of fun. No matter how many time you die, you'll find yourself selecting 'restart.' What are you waiting for? Enter, the Billiards Dungeon!
